cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 14th Oct 2025 (AEST) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 14th Oct 2025 (AEST) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: An economical option for solo travellers or groups of friends travelling together. This female only shared room feature single bed bunks with super comfy linen and pillows.  Air-conditioned, free wifi and continental breakfast daily included.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.name: Standard 8 Bed Mixed Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: An economical option for solo travellers or groups of friends travelling together. Our shared rooms feature single bed bunks with super comfy linen and pillows. Your stay includes; air-conditioning, free wifi and continental breakfast daily.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

dorms.labelDescription: An economical option for solo travellers or groups of friends travelling together. Our shared mixed rooms feature single bed bunks with super comfy linen and pillows.  Air-conditioned, free wifi and continental breakfast daily included.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only

Deposit only

privates.name: Standard Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
Just need to drop your bags & get a good night's sleep? Our Comfy Rooms feature a double bed with comfortable linen & pillows, air-conditioning, private ensuite & TV;  guaranteeing a good night sleep. 
These rooms are located upstairs on the first floor.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or donâ€™t show up.

privates.name: Deluxe Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: The best views over the wake park are from our Luxe Lakeview Rooms. Each with a Queen bed, organic linen & extra pillows, a 50inch wall mounted TV, desk space and private ensuite stocked with designer botanical bodywash & hair care products by SALUS.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
